Plot: Two tapes, two Parisian mob killers, one corrupt policeman, an opera fan, a teenage thief, and the coolest philosopher ever filmed. All these characters twist their way through an intricate and stylish French language thriller.
Title: Diva
Writer: Daniel Odier (novel), Jean-Jacques Beineix (adaptation), Jean Van Hamme (adaptation), Jean-Jacques Beineix (dialogue)
Actors: Wilhelmenia Fernandez, Frédéric Andréi, Richard Bohringer, Thuy An Luu
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 7 wins & 8 nominations.
